name: pocket chicken family
notes:
free pattern available as video tutorial on my blog: https://www.sweetsofties.com/2023/03/pocket-chicken-family.html

get the crochet kit here: https://yarnsea.com/en/project/2123/pocket-chicken-family

the pocket chicken family includes instructions for crocheting the mother hen, baby chick, and their nest bed.  all of the pieces are completely no-sew and crocheted in one piece. this beginner-friendly bird doll pattern is quick and easy to work up.  it can be kept as a squishy plush with super bulky blanket yarn, or turned into a small mini keychain with thinner weight yarns. it is great as a birthday gift, christmas or holiday gift, as party favors, non candy easter egg stuffers, or market/craft fair products.  kids and children alike will adore these cute barn farm animals! 

**size**
height: 3.5” (9 cm) 

**materials**
super bulky “6” yarn in desired colors (yarn i used: https://hobbii.mvk.co/2g8s4)
8mm plastic safety eyes (x2)
5mm crochet hook
stuffing
scissors 

**level**
★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner/intermediate. requires familiarity with stitches used (below), changing colors, and attaching yarn.

**stitches & techniques used (us terminology)** 
fo = fasten off
ch = chain
sl st = slip stitch
sc = single crochet
inc = increase (insert 2 sc in same st)
dec = decrease (sc 2 sts together)
hdc = half double crochet
dc = double crochet
